import React from 'react' export default function WeeklyWeather(weather) { return (
16 ? "weather_container warm" : "weather_container" : "weather_container" } > setInput(e.target.value)} value={input} onKeyPress={handleSearch} /> {typeof weather.main != "undefined" ? (
{weather.name}, {weather.sys.country}
{dateBuilder(new Date())}
{Math.round(weather.main.temp)}°c
Min temp: {Math.round(weather.main.temp_min)}°c
Max temp: {Math.round(weather.main.temp_max)}°c
Humidity: {weather.main.humidity}
{weather.weather[0].main}
) : ( "" )}
) }
